reason to combine.

entry.title: Movie: Star Wars Episode 6: Return of the Jedi, written by George Lucas (1983)
entry.content:
Movie: Star Wars Episode 6: Return of the Jedi, written by George Lucas (1983)20151228
This is a great movie. Carrie Fisher looks so good in an elegant
and non-sleazy way in all the movies, slave outfit excepted. A few
thoughts about the original trilogy as a whole: it is so
unconcerned with the big story and the Jedi are way
under-powered. It is as-if the prequels were made after decades of
pondering all the cool things that were implied by this set of
movies and tried to realize them.

Malakili (Rancor Crying Guy) is a detail I'd never thought of
before.
  • Movies
  • 1983

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy Type-0 HD (PS4, 2015) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy Type-0 HD (PS4, 2015) (6)20151227
I replayed the escape mission a few times to get up my levels
before the next mission. I am beginning to appreciate the game
more and more as I play different characters over and over. I do
wish that I didn't have to grind so much though, although I
suspect that the game is actually just really short. I'm tempted
to do all the stuff to get all the cool accessories, etc.

Total time: 13:48
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy Type-0 HD
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Movie: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back, written by George Lucas (1980)
entry.content:
Movie: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back, written by George Lucas (1980)20151227
This movie is really great, although in retrospect with all of
these movies, it is amazing how few locations and sequences they
have. Something I notice a lot about the original trilogy is that
they don't dwell on the back-story and world-building aspects of
the story. They just let it be implied.

I had never really noticed or remembered the way that Vader asks
Luke to rule the galaxy with him and defeat the Emperor with
him. It's interesting to think that he has been waiting for this
since he said the same thing to Padme.
  • Movies
  • 1980

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy Type-0 HD (PS4, 2015) (5)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy Type-0 HD (PS4, 2015) (5)20151226
I did the two missions in the Imperial Capital. The first one was
not very hard but the second one, the escape, was very hard. I
think I will do it a few more times to grind. I started the first
one at level 20, with a few characters at 21, and the two missions
were ranked 22 and then 23. The combat is still awesome in this
game. I think my favorite character is Seven.

Total time: 12:27
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy Type-0 HD
  • PS4
  • 2015
